name.description: The name of the service instance. Used for service endpoint, must be unique within the audience.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Resource Group in which to create the Service.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure Region where the Service should be created.

access_policy_ids.description: A set of Azure object id's that are allowed to access the Service. If not configured, the default value is the object id of the service principal or user that is running Terraform.

cosmosdb_throughput.description: The provisioned throughput for the backing database. Range of `400`-`1000`. Defaults to `400`.

kind.description: The type of the service. Values at time of publication are: `fhir`, `fhir-Stu3` and `fhir-R4`. Default value is `fhir`.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

audience.description: The intended audience to receive authentication tokens for the service. The default value is https://azurehealthcareapis.com

smart_proxy_enabled.description: Enables the 'SMART on FHIR' option for mobile and web implementations.

allowed_origins.description: A set of origins to be allowed via CORS.

allowed_headers.description: A set of headers to be allowed via CORS.

allowed_methods.description: The methods to be allowed via CORS.

max_age_in_seconds.description: The max age to be allowed via CORS.

allow_credentials.description: If credentials are allowed via CORS.

id.description: The ID of the Healthcare Service.

create.description: Used when creating the Healthcare Service.

update.description: Used when updating the Healthcare Service.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Healthcare Service.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Healthcare Service.
